an3.29:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa tatharupam cakkhu na hoti yatharupena cakkhuna anadhigatam va bhogam adhigaccheyya adhigatam va bhogam phatim kareyya;
an3.29:1.6: tatharupampissa cakkhu na hoti yatharupena cakkhuna kusalakusale dhamme janeyya, savajjanavajje dhamme janeyya, hinappanite dhamme janeyya, kanhasukkasappatibhage dhamme janeyya.
an3.29:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa tatharupam cakkhu hoti yatharupena cakkhuna anadhigatam va bhogam adhigaccheyya adhigatam va bhogam phatim kareyya;
an3.29:2.3: tatharupam panassa cakkhu na hoti yatharupena cakkhuna kusalakusale dhamme janeyya, savajjanavajje dhamme janeyya, hinappanite dhamme janeyya, kanhasukkasappatibhage dhamme janeyya.
an3.29:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa tatharupam cakkhu hoti yatharupena cakkhuna anadhigatam va bhogam adhigaccheyya, adhigatam va bhogam phatim kareyya;
an3.29:3.3: tatharupampissa cakkhu hoti yatharupena cakkhuna kusalakusale dhamme janeyya;
an3.29:3.4: savajjanavajje dhamme janeyya, hinappanite dhamme janeyya, kanhasukkasappatibhage dhamme janeyya.
an3.29:3.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggala santo samvijjamana lokasminti.
